slack.message_prefix: optional prefix - can be used for mentions
slack.bot_name: optional bot name, defaults to slack defined
slack.proxy_addr: optional - your proxy address for http proxy, like squid, i.e. 192.168.10.100
slack.proxy_port: optional - should be port used by proxy, i.e. 3128
slack.admin_text: optional Text to display for admin url
